sqlMap.insert:
select chatroom_seq.nextval from dual
insert into chatroom ( chatroom_code , chatroom_writer )
values( #chatroom_code# , #chatroom_writer# )
sqlMap.select: select chatjoin_chatroom as chatroom_code , myroom2.chatroom_writer , myroom2.chatroom_writer_name , myroom2.chatroom_reg_date , listagg(emp_name,', ') within group(order by emp_code) as chatroom_jl from chatjoin ,emp, (select chatroom.chatroom_code , chatroom.chatroom_open , chatroom.chatroom_writer , emp.emp_name as chatroom_writer_name , to_char(chatroom.chatroom_reg_date,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:dd') as chatroom_reg_date from emp, chatroom, (select chatjoin_chatroom from chatjoin where chatjoin_emp = #emp_code# and chatjoin_delete = 'n') myroom1 where myroom1.chatjoin_chatroom = chatroom.chatroom_code and chatroom.chatroom_writer = emp.emp_code) myroom2 where chatjoin_chatroom in (myroom2.chatroom_code) and chatjoin_emp = emp_code and chatjoin_join = 'y' and myroom2.chatroom_open = 'y' group by chatjoin_chatroom , myroom2.chatroom_reg_date , myroom2.chatroom_writer , myroom2.chatroom_writer_name
sqlMap.update: update chatroom set chatroom_open = 'n' where chatroom_code = #chatroom_code#
